body: pure vanilla? when is teacher/student and incest(other works) vanilla? This one even has sexual assault and rape like some of his other works. All of their endings are wholesome but not a single one of his titles are vanilla.

Tank published in 2002, but Fuuga's themes & style haven't changed much since... Clean & functional art ... Forbidden relationships between coolly detatched men & alarmingly irresponsible women ... Miserable families ... Overlapping storylines ... And a core of pure vanilla
Cheating tag... And it is not as good as his others works...
